h3_title: The Zodiac Village of the Painted Realm
content: From the North Shore Shrine, keep to the right this time and head along the lakeshore until you round a bend to find what looks to be giant skeletal remains strewn around the beach.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bitter_Lake_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Bitter Lake Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Boss Fight - Chen Loong' and the sub-subsection 'The Zodiac Village of the Painted Realm'.
The content is as follows:
From the North Shore Shrine, keep to the right this time and head along the lakeshore until you round a bend to find what looks to be giant skeletal remains strewn around the beach.
